scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_execpath && process.env.npm_execpath.includes('npm') && !process.env.SKIP_PNPM_CHECK) { console.error('\x1b[31m‚ùå Please use pnpm instead of npm!\x1b[0m'); console.error('\x1b[33müí° Run: pnpm install\x1b[0m'); console.error('\x1b[33müí° Or set SKIP_PNPM_CHECK=1 to bypass\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }"
